text: The men's hammer throw event at the 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Lisbon, Portugal, at Estádio Universitário de Lisboa on 22 and 23 July. A 7257g (senior implement) hammer was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Szymon Ziółkowski ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Igor
